languages.text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Click [LMB] on a container to open it.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
languages.original_text: На вашем пути повстречаются контейнеры, ящики и прочие объекты окружения, которые можно обыскивать. Внутри хранятся самые разные трофеи — от вещей, которые никогда не пригодятся Вольному Торговцу (но будут полезны торговцам), до новой экипировки и сюжетно важных предметов. Кликните [ЛКМ] на контейнере, чтобы открыть его. В дальнейшем вам повстречаются запертые контейнеры — чтобы их открыть, членам отряда будет необходимо успешно пройти проверку требуемого {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g}.

languages.original_text:
You will come across containers, crates and other environment objects that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of trophies — from garbage to new equipment and important plot items.
Click [LMB] on the container to open it.

traits.locale_text:
На вашем пути повстречаются контейнеры, ящики и прочие объекты окружения, которые можно обыскивать. Внутри хранятся самые разные трофеи — от мусора до новой экипировки и сюжетно важных предметов.
Кликните [ЛКМ] по контейнеру, чтобы его открыть.

На вашем пути повстречаются контейнеры, ящики и прочие объекты окружения, которые можно обыскивать. Внутри хранятся самые разные трофеи — от мусора до новой экипировки и сюжетно важных предметов.
Кликните [ЛКМ] по контейнеру, чтобы его открыть.

languages.text:
在旅途的过程中，您会遇到集装箱、板条箱或环境中的其他物件，您可以对其进行搜索。您可以在这些箱子里面找到各种各样的战利品，可能会找到对行商浪人毫无用处的垃圾（但可能会引起其他商贩的兴趣），以及新的装备，或是重要的剧情物品。
点击鼠标左键，即可打开箱子。
您还会遇到上锁的箱子。若想打开上锁的箱子，您的队伍成员必须通过相关{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Click [LMB] on a container to open it.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
在旅途的过程中，您会遇到集装箱、板条箱或环境中的其他物件，您可以对其进行搜索。您可以在这些箱子里面找到各种各样的战利品，可能会找到对行商浪人毫无用处的垃圾（但可能会引起其他商贩的兴趣），以及新的装备，或是重要的剧情物品。
点击鼠标左键，即可打开箱子。
您还会遇到上锁的箱子。若想打开上锁的箱子，您的队伍成员必须通过相关{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。

languages.text:
旅をする中で、探索可能な環境内でコンテナ、木箱、その他のオブジェクトを見つけることができる。中には、自由開拓者には何の役にも立たないもの（しかし商人の興味をそそるかもしれない）から、新しい装備品や重要なプロットアイテムまで、さまざまな戦利品が入っている。
コンテナの上で [LMB] をクリックすると開くことができる。
鍵のかかったコンテナにも遭遇することもある。コンテナを開けるには、パーティーメンバーが関連する{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格する必要がある。
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Click [LMB] on a container to open it.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
旅中に、探索可能な環境内でコンテナ、木箱、その他のオブジェクトを見つけることができる。中には、ローグトレーダーには何の役にも立たないもの（商人の興味をそそるかもしれない）から、新しい装備品や重要なプロットアイテムまで、さまざまな戦利品が入っている。
コンテナの上で [LMB] をクリックすると開くことができる。
鍵のかかったコンテナにも遭遇することもある。コンテナを開けるには、パーティーメンバーが関連する{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格する必要がある。

languages.text:
En tus aventuras habrá contenedores, cajas y otros objetos que puedes encontrar por el entorno. Dentro de ellos puede haber botín de lo más diverso: desde artículos que de poco sirven a un Comerciante Independiente (pero que pueden hacer las delicias de cualquier mercader) hasta equipamiento nuevo y objetos importantes para la trama.
Pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre un contenedor para abrirlo.
También encontrarás contenedores cerrados. Para abrirlos, los miembros de tu grupo tendrán que superar la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} correspondiente.
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Click [LMB] on a container to open it.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
En tus aventuras habrá contenedores, cajas y otros objetos que puedes encontrar por el entorno. Dentro de ellos puede haber botín de lo más diverso: desde artículos que de poco sirven a un Comerciante Independiente (pero que pueden hacer las delicias de cualquier mercader) hasta equipamiento nuevo y objetos importantes para la trama.
Pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre un contenedor para abrirlo.
También encontrarás contenedores cerrados. Para abrirlos, los miembros de tu grupo tendrán que superar la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} correspondiente.

languages.text:
Auf deinen Reisen wirst du auf Container, Kisten und andere Objekte in der Umgebung stoßen, die du durchsuchen kannst. Darin kannst du eine Unmenge an Beute finden – von Dingen, die für einen Freihändler nutzlos sind, (aber vielleicht das Interesse eines Händlers wecken), bis hin zu neuer Ausrüstung und wichtigen Story-Gegenständen.
Container kannst du mit [LMB] öffnen.
Du wirst auch auf verschlossene Container stoßen. Um einen solchen Container zu öffnen, müssen die Mitglieder deiner Gruppe die entsprechende {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestehen.
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Click [LMB] on a container to open it.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Auf deinen Reisen wirst du auf Container, Kisten und andere Objekte in der Umgebung stoßen, die du durchsuchen kannst. Darin kannst du eine Unmenge an Beute finden – von Dingen, die für einen Freihändler nutzlos sind, (aber vielleicht das Interesse eines Händlers wecken), bis hin zu neuer Ausrüstung und wichtigen Story-Gegenständen.
Container kannst du mit der [LMB] öffnen.
Du wirst auch auf verschlossene Container stoßen. Um einen solchen Container zu öffnen, müssen die Mitglieder deiner Gruppe die entsprechende {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeits-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestehen.

languages.text:
Au cours de vos déplacements, vous trouverez des conteneurs, des caisses et d'autres objets que vous pourrez fouiller. Ceux-ci renferment tous types de butins, des choses qui ne sont d'aucune utilité pour un libre-marchand (mais qui peuvent susciter l'intérêt d'un autre marchand), mais aussi de nouveaux équipements et des objets importants pour l'intrigue.
Cliquez avec le [BGS] sur un conteneur pour l'ouvrir.
Vous trouverez également des conteneurs verrouillés. Pour les ouvrir, les membres de votre groupe devront réussir le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} correspondant.
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Click [LMB] on a container to open it.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Au cours de vos déplacements, vous trouverez des conteneurs, des caisses et d'autres objets que vous pourrez fouiller. Ceux-ci renferment tous types de butins, des choses qui ne sont d'aucune utilité pour un libre-marchand (mais qui peuvent susciter l'intérêt d'un autre marchand), mais aussi de nouveaux équipements et des objets importants pour l'intrigue.
Cliquez avec le [BGS] sur un conteneur pour l'ouvrir.
Vous trouverez également des conteneurs verrouillés. Pour les ouvrir, les membres de votre groupe devront réussir le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} correspondant.

languages.text:
Maceraların sırasında çevrede saklama yerleri, kasalar gibi içlerini araştırabileceğin nesnelere denk geleceksin. İçlerinden, bir Hür Tacir'in hiç işine yaramayacak (ama bir tüccarın ilgisini cezbedebilecek) şeylerden yeni ekipmana ve önemli senaryo eşyalarına kadar çeşitli ganimetler çıkabilir.
Bir saklama yerini açmak için üzerine sol fare tuşuyla tıkla.
Ayrıca kilitli saklama yerleriyle de karşılaşacaksın. Böyle bir saklama yerini açabilmen için, grup üyelerinin ilişkili {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testini{/g} geçmeleri gerekir.
languages.original_text:
In your travels, you will come across containers, crates, and other objects in the environment that you can search. Inside, you can find a variety of loot — from things that are of no use to a Rogue Trader (but may still pique a merchant's interest) to new equipment and important plot items.
Click [LMB] on a container to open it.
You will also encounter locked containers. To open such a container, your party members will have to pass the associated {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
